test.name: Open Thinx Homepage Using Chrome Browser

kw.name: Open Thinx Homepage Using Chrome Browser
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element '//div[@class='modal rounded-5 bg-brand-light-beige relative']' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot
kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets the focus to the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element '//input[@class='body-2 undefined w-full rounded-[30px] border border-solid border-default px-6 py-3 placeholder:text-default focus:border-default focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-default']' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${ModalEmailFieldError} = Please enter a valid email address.
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.arg: Please enter a valid email address.
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element '//p[@class='body-3 mt-1 text-center text-error']' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${CheckboxFieldError} = Please check the box to acknowledge our terms and policies to continue.
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.arg: Please check the box to acknowledge our terms and policies to continue.
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
